So you want to learn `dtplyr`? Well, you are in luck if you have used `dplyr`.

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(dtplyr)
library(dplyr)
```



```{r}
dt <- data.table(
  x = rnorm(1e6),
  y = runif(1e6),
  grp = sample(1L:3L, 1e6, replace = TRUE)
)
dt
```


```{r}
dt <- lazy_dt(dt)
```
